Source.Name: duplicacy
Source.Summary: A new generation cloud backup tool
Source.Description: Duplicacy is a new generation cross-platform cloud backup tool based on the idea of Lock-Free Deduplication. It is the only cloud backup tool that allows multiple computers to back up to the same storage simultaneously without using any locks (thus readily amenable to various cloud storage services).

Package.Name: duplicacy
